channel.title: [Project Insanity] Simple PK Rewards System (Rep++)
channel.description:
Can someone help me with an easy rewards system? Basically all I want is when a player dies, the player drops 10,000GP along with whatever other items they are wearing. Not too difficult, it's just something that would be a nice addition. It's most likely one snippet, so if someone could help me out with this, that'd be great.
It has to do with the creategrounditem method in playerassistant.java, I just don't know how to write it out properly. Rep++ for all help.
Thanks,
Anthony

item.title: [Project Insanity] Simple PK Rewards System (Rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“Resent, post:3, topic:440078”]Alright, I’ve added that method, but now I’m getting this…

[code]src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1108: error: cannot find symbol
createGroundItem(c, 995, c.absX, c.absY,
10000, playerId);

    ^

symbol: variable playerId
location: class PlayerAssistant
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Edit: I don’t think that there’s a creategrounditem method in my playerassistant.java… How can I declare it?[/quote]

Erhm, you have to find the location of it. Typically in the ItemHandler class.

server.itemHandler or import.

Also, c.playerId. My mistake.

Read full topic

item.title: [Project Insanity] Simple PK Rewards System (Rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

If there’s ever a shadow of doubt, check the methods parameters.

createGroundItem(final Client c, int itemId, final int itemX, final int itemY, final int itemAmount, final int playerId)

createGroundItem(c, 995, c.absX, c.absY, 10000, playerId);

Do the same for their items, look at the dropItems method now… Replace 995 with what you find, etc.

Read full topic
